```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(openPoznan)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r}
# the polls in poznan
data <- local_government(Coord = T)

gov_coord <- local_government(Coord = T)
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

ggplot(gov_coord, aes(x=Longitude , y= Latitude)) +
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x= V1, y= V2, group=id), colour = "black")+
geom_point(colour = "red")+ labs(title="The polls in Poznań")+
  ylab("Longitude")+
  xlab("Latitude")+
  theme(legend.title = element_text(colour="blue", size=5, 
                                      face="bold"))
```


```{r}
# area electoral in poznan

Area <- electoral_areas(Coord = T)

oblast2coord_id <- electoral_areas(Coord = T)

ggplot(oblast2coord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id))+
geom_polygon(colour = "black")+labs(title="Area electoral in Poznań")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
```


```{r}
# circle electoral of local government

circlecoord_id <- electoral_circles(Coord = T)

ggplot(circlecoord_id, aes(x= V1, y= V2, group=id), col = "red") +
 geom_polygon(color = "black")+ labs(title="Circle electoral of local government")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
```



```{r}
# District in Poznan
district <- districts(Coord = T)

districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

ggplot(districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id))+
geom_polygon(colour = "black")+labs(title="District in Poznań")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")

```



```{r, fig.height=7}
Bike_paths <- bike_paths(Coord = T)

bcoord_id <- bike_paths(Coord = T)
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

ggplot(bcoord_id, aes(x=V1 , y= V2, group=id2)) +
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id), colour="black")+
    geom_path(aes(colour=as.factor(id2)))+
      labs(title="Bike paths in Poznań")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
```



```{r, fig.height=7}
# Dydactic paths in Poznan

Dydactic <- dydactic_paths(Coord = T)

dcoord_id <- dydactic_paths(Coord = T)
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

 ggplot(dcoord_id, aes(x=V1 , y= V2, group=id1))+
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id), colour="black")+
    geom_path(aes(colour=as.factor(id1)))+
      labs(title="Dydactic paths in Poznań")+
   theme(legend.position="bottom")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
```



```{r, fig.height=7}
# Trail in Poznań
Trail <- paths_walking(Coord = T)

pathscoord_id <- paths_walking(Coord = T)
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

ggplot(pathscoord_id, aes(x= V1, y= V2, group=id3)) +
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id), colour="black")+
    geom_path(aes(colour=as.factor(id3)))+
      labs(title="Trails in Poznań")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
  
```



```{r, fig.height=7}
# all paths 
Trail <- paths_walking(Coord = T)

pathscoord_id <- paths_walking(Coord = T)

    Dydactic <- dydactic_paths(Coord = T)

    dcoord_id <- dydactic_paths(Coord = T)
  
          Bike_paths <- bike_paths(Coord = T)

          bcoord_id <- bike_paths(Coord = T)
          districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)
          tractcoord_id <- royal_imperial_route()
          
ggplot(districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id))+
  geom_polygon(colour = "black")+
  geom_path(data = pathscoord_id, aes(x=V1, y=V2, group = id3, colour=as.factor(id3)))+

   geom_path(data = dcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y=V2, group = id1, colour=as.factor(id1)))+
  
   geom_path(data = bcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y=V2, group = id2, colour=as.factor(id2)))+
    
  geom_path(data = tractcoord_id, aes(x=V1 , y= V2, group = id ,colour=as.factor(id)))+
  labs(title = "All Paths in Poznań")+
  theme(legend.position="bottom")+ 
  ylab("Longitude")+ 
  xlab("Latitude")
```

```{r}
# historical chuch in poznan
church_relikt <- historical_churches(Coord = T)

church_coord <- historical_churches(Coord = T)
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)
relikt_coord <-monuments(Coord = T)

ggplot(church_coord, aes(x= V1, y= V2))+
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x= V1, y= V2, group=id), colour = "black")+
  geom_point(colour = "red")+
  geom_point(data = relikt_coord, aes(x= V1, y= V2), colour = "yellow")+labs(title = "Churches and Monuments in Poznań")+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")
```

```{r, fig.height=7}
# trakr 
Trakr <- royal_imperial_route()

tractcoord_id <- royal_imperial_route()
districtcoord_id <- districts(Coord = T)

ggplot(tractcoord_id, aes(x=V1 , y= V2, group_by(id))) +
  geom_polygon(data = districtcoord_id, aes(x=V1, y= V2, group=id), colour="black")+
  geom_path(aes(colour=as.factor(id)))+ ylab("Longitude")+ xlab("Latitude")

```
